description:
It’s no secret, cheese is delicious, and Moon Cheese is no exception to this fact. Moon Cheese takes 100% natural cheese and dries it into individual crunchy bites. The cheese becomes shelf stable, and perfect for hikes, road trips, or anywhere you need your cheese fix.

  • Compared with other drying methods, the nutraREV® drying process is more energy efficient, more nutrient rich, and preservative free
  • Ingredients: Cheddar Cheese (pasteurized milk, salt, cheese cultures, annatto [vegetable colour] enzymes), seasoning (cheddar cheese [cultured pasteurized milk, salt, enzymes], non-fat milk, maltodextrin, butter [cream, salt], salt, disodium phosphate, yeast extract, natural flavour, annatto extract), and vegetable oil
name: Moon Cheese Medium Cheddar
